plot: Marisa is dying but doesn't want her husband, Juan, to find out. So, before his daily visit, she has Concha put some make-up on her. Based on real events.
title: Maquillaje
plot_es: Marisa is dying but doesn't want her husband, Juan, to find out. So, before his daily visit, she has Concha put some make-up on her. Based on real events.
